message.body: Hi Julia, all set for tomorrow still? Just FYI, skippy is on no turnout and 1/2 grain until we figure out what is wrong with him(he's lame) meg is taking care of him. Notes in the barn re this. Also, would you mind letting my puppies out for a few mins to pee when u get here? Around noon right? :) let me know! Thanks!! Have fun tomorrow! :)
Want me to kick horses out tonight? Nice out!
Sure, can you give them hay out there, make sure the piles are apart enough so they don't fight ;)
Sure. What about skippy? Louie in with him maybe?
Nah, leave Titan with him, he doesn't care. You could put lucky below ring so he's next to others if your worried. I think there might be a rail Down by the h2o trough though, need to put back up
